headline.main: Czar Bust in Crimea Reportedly Appears to Shed Tears
headline.print_headline: Czar Bust in Crimea Reportedly Appears to Shed Tears

lead_paragraph: Russian news reports say curious and pious people are visiting a bust of the last czar in the Crimean capital after reports spread that the sculpture appeared to be weeping.
snippet: Russian news reports say curious and pious people are visiting a bust of the last czar in the Crimean capital after reports spread that the sculpture appeared to be weeping....
